website_summaries.verdict: An affordable pocket multi-tool that's easy to use and will hardly take up any room in your wallet.
pros: Includes a screwdriver, bottle opener, wrench, and saw blade
Only the thickness of 2 credit cards
Contains a diagram of all the tools and how to use them
cons: Be careful when using it because it contains sharp blades

customer_reviews.title: Nice inclusion in your wallet
customer_reviews.text: I have slid this in my minimalist wallet. It is always with me if I’m ever desperate. From a practical stand point, the “tools” really aren’t that useful and you will find their applications limited. I have used the knife and bottle opener a couple of times since receiving this. It is a nice novelty and can come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Paule P.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to have!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Father in law. It is his birthday gift. He is a works for the campsite in Washington and Oregon. It is the perfect pocket tool for those "quick fix time". It comes in very handy for him with the campsite, RV, truck, and of course fishing. I am definitely get one for my husband for his birthday. I am sure it will come in handy for him OTR in the Semi. 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stocking stuffer for myself!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim for myself for Christmas. I love that it fits in my credit card slots in my wallet and it came with a protective cover. the blade is super sharp and came in handy when unboxing a few toys for my 4yo. I haven't had mine very long, so I have no idea how long the blade holds an edge, but it should be a while with light use. hopefully, I highly recommend purchasing 1,2 or more of these. give them to your friends!
customer_reviews.author: MojoJojo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool has got to be one of the coolest tools I've had. It's sleek, well made, sturdy, and functional. I love that it's small like a credit card - about two cards thick.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Doyle

customer_reviews.title: You'll love it when you need it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits in my wallet. Appears to be well made. The ninja is made thick enough to resist bending in normal use. The compass function is essentially useless, but I really didn't see how it would help anyway. My cell phone has a compass app. The saw tool is useful for only the smallest cutting projects....but let's be real, this thing is the size of a credit card so it's an emergency aid. Considering it's size and multiple functions, it's a great tool for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Cranky Homosapien

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a random purchase along with a number of other items, not expecting to use it much. I have to say, rarely a day goes by that I do not pull it out of my wallet for some small but useful task. Cutting open packages and envelopes. Opening bottles, even taking an outlet cover off. Very handy
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: A very nice and useful gift for father's day
customer_reviews.text: This Credit card size multitool comes with a very Sharp knife Edge, be careful when handle it. I bought it to open bottles with one hand. A very nice and useful gift for father's day.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Evers G

customer_reviews.title: Handy Dandy Gizmo
customer_reviews.text: I keep this stainless steel gizmo in my wallet and found uses for it from the day I received it. It is a handy dandy tool for both women and men and would make a great holiday gift for any grab bag, exchange or even stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: The Gabster

customer_reviews.title: What a great gift to give the person who had everything
customer_reviews.text: What a great gift to give the person who had everything! I gave this to my son-in-law for Christmas. It took him a minute or two to figure out what it was and then he had such fun trying to figure out what each tool option was. He immediately slipped it into his wallet with a big smile. 😊 Thanks for helping me with my shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays in my wallet - works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I had this as a gift, and I forget its in my wallet, does not protrude and bulk up the wallet, i've only used the blade so far and it is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Welsh Expat

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: A great additive to a Card or Gift! Arrived on time, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Branson

customer_reviews.title: Don't Leave Home Without This Versatile Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy tool. Credit card sized, it allows for easy carry in wallet or purse. It even comes with a protective sheath to keep it clean. An on-the-go tool for those little glitches, it's a Swiss Knife without being a Swiss Knife.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card Recipient

customer_reviews.title: Great for local use. Don’t try to pack in airplane carry on bag
customer_reviews.text: Handy gadget. This is not allowed on airplane carry-ons. Make sure to pack it in a checked bag if you are flying somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: C J

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and sharp
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I can't find my Swiss Army knife and it looks like a more compact version of the one I had; all the tools are there and more convenient. The sharp edges are incredibly sharp. Instead of carrying a bunch of things in my purse or car, I just have one thing - my Multi Tool!
customer_reviews.author: Sk Delph

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoorsman Stocking Stuffer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a stocking stuffer for my son. I think he will be pleased as he likes gadgets of all kinds. It is as advertised and looks to be of good quality and will be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Dancy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as gifts fr some friends, They all loved them
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bowman

customer_reviews.title: I did open it to check it out and it looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a Christmas gift and haven't given it away yet. I did open it to check it out and it looks just like the picture. It really is about the size of a credit card, but it seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This tiny gadget is so versatile and works. It is also sharp so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. Heavy and well-made and reasonably priced. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barb51

customer_reviews.title: Quality card tool.
customer_reviews.text: Fits in my wallet quite nicely and is only slightly thicker than a normal credit card. Tools work as expected too.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben Gordon

customer_reviews.title: but it is sturdy and has a diagram of all the tools
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to actually use this tool yet, but it is sturdy and has a diagram of all the tools. I've put it in my wallet and am eagerly waiting for the chance to whip it out and save the day.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Small and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, nifty little thing, and it's small enough to fit into any credit card pocket within a wallet or billfold.
customer_reviews.author: Bookwrym

customer_reviews.title: NOT TSA APPROVED – decent until confiscated
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but it got taken away by airport security. You would think that a wallet tool would be TSA approved, but apparently not. Still a good tool, just know before buying it that it is not ideal for people who travel frequently (not likely to check their wallet every time to see if they took the tool out).
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: He has a thin money clip wallet instead of a bulky one and I was worried it might not fit but it’s perfect. Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend and he absolutely loves it ! He has a thin money clip wallet instead of a bulky one and I was worried it might not fit but it’s perfect . Makes a great gift , very useful
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Well made item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to go in my art boxes for emergencies when I paint away from home. Haven't used them yet but Im sure they will be handy. They seem sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. Fits in slim wallets yet is sturdy enough to function as all the tools it is.
customer_reviews.author: -Arwen

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget
customer_reviews.text: Great little gadget. Small in size and strong in features
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Got the tools all on hand(literally) when needed!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift to my husband which he loves, it's small(size of a palm) and fits right in his wallet. He finds it very useful, he has only used some of the tools such as the knife saw edge and wood saw blade, both which are very sharp though it does come with a nice black cover. However he's got the tools all on hand(literally) when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jany Vang

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Supper useful! I have it in my wallet and it’s a supper useful tool to have around if you don’t normally carry tools or anything!

customer_reviews.title: Tool box on the go
customer_reviews.text: Great compact tool. The perfect device for those times you don't have access to your tool box.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a cool little utility tool, its pretty straightforward.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the guy that has it all!
customer_reviews.text: What a great little tool! Bought for a guy that has everything. It fits in his wallet super easy

customer_reviews.title: A lot of uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift but when I looked at it it looks very strong and I couldn't believe everything it does

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with purchase. Item is made from quality materials, edges finished nicely with no sharp edged where there should not be. Will buy another one for myself.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my grandson. He used it a lot at our Christmas gathering to help open gifts. It is well made and useful. Great gift for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Credit Card Tool
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised at the quality of the tool. I was expecting something that is nice and good enough to give to my son, but was surprised to find that it is a lot better quality quality than I expected.

customer_reviews.title: Good gift

customer_reviews.title: You need one of these Ninja tools for your pocket.
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review before, but this one warranted mention!! I received the Ninja tool about a week ago and have used it EVERY DAY!! It's a great little item to carry in your wallet or pocket when you need. It's not bulky like a pocket knife and does so much more!! I would definitely recommend this item for yourself or as a gift for a loved one or friend.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a great buy. Sharp tools, and small size. It also comes with a small case for it, which looks nice. Perfect to put in your wallet or gift it to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: It arrived quickly and was nicely packaged for gift giving
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for high school graduation gifts. It arrived quickly and was nicely packaged for gift giving. The tool itself was sturdy stainless steel, had all the options as advertised, and was, indeed, small enough to fit into a man's wallet. The young men who received it were delighted and I am ordering additional ones to give as Father's Day gifts.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tool to throw in the glove box or back pocket.
customer_reviews.text: A nice little multi-tool that may come in handy someday. The saw and blade seem like they are sharp enough to do their job, but not sharp enough to cut you when using the other tools, which was my main concern.

product_meta.title: Ninja Outdoorsman 11 in 1 Stainless Steel Credit Card Pocket Sized Survival Multi Tool (Single)
product_meta.description:
Size Name:Single| Color Name:Stainless Steel11 in 1 stainless steel multi tool is your answer to a convenient tool that can be brought anywhere with you. 

Bring it camping, hiking, fishing and anywhere else. 

Keep one in your car, tool box, backpack or wallet. 

Official Ninja Outdoorsman tools are laser etched with a logo and have an English instruction card.

Tips for Water Compass

1. Place tool flat on a flat surface.
2. Drop a few drops of water in its center.
3. Magnetize a very light piece of metal.
4. Lay shaving, pin..etc. on top of water.
5. Result should be the ends pointing toward magnetic north and south.
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY: This wallet multi tool is made of high-quality stainless steel so it will not break, bend or rust.
SMALL SIZE: Logo etched tool comes with fitted carrying case and English info card

11 GREAT TOOLS: Can Opener, Cutting Edge, Flat Screwdriver, Ruler, Beer Bottle Opener, 4 Position Wrench, Butterfly Screw Wrench, Saw Blade, Direction Ancillary Indication (Water Compass), 2 Position Wrench, Keychain or lanyard Hole.
GREAT GIFT: Stocking stuffer, secret santa, groomsmen, friends, birthdays, events, co-workers
RESOURCE TOOL: Take it hiking, camping, fishing, hunting. Leave an extra one in your tool box, tackle box, car glove box or backpack

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars449 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
